attributes.action: Build in car insurance and road tax into the cost of fuel.
attributes.additional_details: Car insurance companies have recently increased premiums massively with no real explanation given. This is unacceptable however we are all at their mercy and have no option to pay what they demand.
attributes.background: Take away the insurance companies constant increases in premiums and road tax payments and bundle it all together in one simple payment at the pumps. People using the road will pay. People who own a vehicle but do not use it or them don’t.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

Cap car insurance prices
